body_html: @rajatmonga I believe the code in https://github.com/pickou/multiplicative-lstm should reproduce the problem. I tried running it the other day but the training phase didn't end, and i wasn't sure what parameters to tweak to ensure it finished quickly enough that i could try loading a corrupt checkpoint. @pickou does training need to run for as long as it does?
